entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student who sat down next to Harry at the Yule Ball. She was asked to dance by a boy from Beauxbatons and did not return when the song ended.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who attended the Yule Ball with Ron and Hermione. He was watching Cho and Cedric during the dance.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who attended the Yule Ball with Harry and Ron. She was dancing and got hot, so she sat down in Parvati's empty chair.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who attended the Yule Ball with Harry and Hermione. He gave Hermione a withering look when she called Viktor 'Viktor'.

entities.name: viktor
entities.description: Viktor is a student from Beauxbatons who asked Parvati to dance at the Yule Ball. Ron teased Hermione for calling him 'Viktor' instead of 'Vicky'.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a student who was dancing with Cedric during the Yule Ball.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a student who was dancing with Cho during the Yule Ball.

relationships.description: Parvati danced with Viktor at the Yule Ball, as mentioned in the text: 'a boy from Beauxbatons asked her to dance'.
Hermione called Viktor 'Viktor' instead of 'Vicky', which Ron teased her about.
